column1:
In  the  light of the  above 
factual  positions  it is  the view

of  both  parties 
that 
the  proceedings  pertaining  to  this  case  is

vitiated ab-initio.  This Court 
is also of the view 
that it would be in

the  best  interest 
of  all  parties 
that  the  Municipal 
Council  of

Jaffana 
takes 
initiative 
to 
file 
two  separate  cases  before  Court
